title: Internet service provider market share in Vietnam fourth quarter 2013
summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The maximum Market share 56.6 is found at Company VNPT and the minimum is found at Others where Company is 6.6.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Company is 50.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The maximum Market share 56.6 is found at Company VNPT and the minimum is found at Others where Company is 6.6.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The maximum Market share 56.6 is found at Company VNPT and the minimum is found at Others where Company is 6.6.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Company is 50.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 4 number of Companys.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Company VNPT and lowest at Company Others.
Second maximum Market share is found at Company FPT Telecom.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Company is 50.0.
Company VNPT is higher than any other Companys with value 56.6, followed by FPT Telecom, and Viettel. Down to Company Others with the lowest value 6.6.
The Company Others has 2.26 times less Market share than average.
The Market share is 100.0 if we add up values of all Companys.
